translation: Of Brahmanas, Kshatriyas, Vaisyas, and Sudras, O Arjuna, the duties are distributed according to the qualities born of their own nature.
commentary: 18.41 Brahmanakshatriyavisham of Brahmanas? Kshatriyas and Vaisyas? of Sudras of Sudras? f as also? Parantapa O Parantapa? Karmani duties? Pravibhaktani are distributed? born of their own nature? by virtues by alities.Commentary Brahmanas? Kshatriyas and Vaisyas are alified to practice the Vedic rites. The members of the fourth class? Or Arjuna? have no claim to these rites? for their profession
